product_name: REI Fleet Running Shorts - Men's 6'' Inseam
long_description: REI Fleet running shorts offer comfort that will have you shooting for a personal best. Quick-drying and lightweight fabric delivers 4-way stretch and an extremely soft feel against skin. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Stretchy crepe liner shorts wick moisture away from body to keep you comfortable; fabric in liner shorts is recycled. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit. 2 side pockets shelter hands, a water-resistant zippered lumbar pocket stows a debit card or cash and an internal pocket stores a key. Reflective highlights increases visibility in low light. The REI Fleet running shorts offer an athletic fit that moves with you.
short_description: REI Fleet running shorts offer comfort that will have you shooting for a personal best.
